name: VS132
description: This sensor applies state-of-the-art 3D ToF technology that is deployed wirelessly via LoRaWANÂ®. The VS132 3D ToF people counting sensor has the advantages of ultra-high accuracy of 99.5% and 100% anonymous detection. This is well suited for bi-directional cross-line people counting applications to obtain accurate and valuable statistics for further decision-making.
author: Akenza AG
